Carrie Steinmetz

LinkedIn Facebook Email

Professional Life

Carrie and her business/dance partner, Emmanuel Pierre-Antoine, are the owners and managers of EPA Dance Studio NYC, the largest ballroom dance studio in the city. Come dance with us!

Philanthropic Work

Carrie is the former board chair and a big supporter of Dancing Classrooms. Through the joyful art and practice of social dances, Dancing Classrooms cultivates engaged learners, collaborative leaders, and inclusive spaces.
